          <title>
            <string language="sl">Koordinatni sistem</string>
            <string language="en">Coordinate system</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beigeordnetes System</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Système du même rang</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sistema coordenado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sistema coordinato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ισότιμο σύστημα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sistema coordinado</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Elektronske prosojnice uporabljamo za uvodno uro v poglavje Premega in obratnega sorazmerja v 8. razredu, ko razširimo koordinatni sistem še na negativne osi ali v 9. razredu v poglavju o funkcijah, ko ponovimo koordinatni sistem.</string>
            <string language="en">Presentation of coordinate system, axis, origin, quadrants and coordinates of a point.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">koordinatni sistem</string>
            <string language="en">coordinate system
coordinate system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">koordinatna os</string>
            <string language="en">coordinate axis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">koordinatno izhodišče</string>
            <string language="en">coordinate origin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kvadrant</string>
            <string language="en">quadrant</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung des beigeordneten Systems, der 
Mittellinie, des Ursprung, der Quadranten und der Koordinaten eines 
Punktes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation de système du même rang, d'axe, 
d'origine, de quarts de cercle et de coordonnées d'un point.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação do sistema coordenado, da linha 
central, da origem, dos quadrantes e das coordenadas de um ponto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione del sistema coordinato, dell'asse, 
dell'origine, dei quadranti e delle coordinate di un punto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση ισότιμων συστήματος, άξονα, προέλευσης, 
τεταρτημόριων και συντεταγμένων ενός σημείου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación del sistema coordinado, del eje, 
del origen, de cuadrantes y de coordenadas de una punta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">beigeordnetes systemcoordinate System</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Koordinatenachse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">beigeordneter Ursprung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quadrant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">quart de cercle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistema coordenado do systemcoordinate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">linha central coordenada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">origem coordenada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">quadrante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ισότιμος άξονας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ισότιμη προέλευση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τεταρτημόριο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sistema coordinado del systemcoordinate</string>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-es">origen coordinado</string>
